header.title: Finance Analytics
header.desc: Python, R, MATLAB, and Excel are the data analysis languages of choice at the world's largest banks. Plotly provides a reporting and collaborative analytics layer for these tools that works equally well in print or web formats.

quotes.author: - Kai Wu, Founding Partner of Kaleidoscope Capital
quotes.desc: When I make investment decisions, I want the best tools in the world to graph, analyze, drill-down, slice, share, and understand my data. Plotly's interactive platform gives our team those features, integrates with our Python workflow, and easily connects to all our data sources.

quotes.author: - Sharon Rapoport, Data Scientist at Plaid
quotes.desc: [We] use plotly to share high-level data analysis and machine learning insights with our non-technical team.
